item.title: Galleries/Portfolios
item.dc:creator: ghostpool_demo
item.content:encoded:
You can create galleries and portfolios using the powerful [[posts]] shortcode that comes with buddy. Below are a few examples of what you can do with the shortcode, but it is capable of doing much more. For all the shortcode options click here.

[divider]

Gallery Example 1

Options

Option Values Default Value Required Description
url Yes The URL of your video
html5_1 The HTML5 video URL for Chrome/Safari (MP4/WEBM)
html5_2 The HTML5 video URL for FireFox/Opera (OGG/OGV)
priority flash, html5 flash Choose whether the video player loads in flash or HTML5 by default
image The URL of your video thumbnail
width 560 Yes The width of your video
height 315 Yes The height of your video
controlbar bottom, over, top, none bottom Control bar display options
autostart true, false false Choose whether your video starts automatically
icons true, false true Choose whether the video play icon is shown
stretching fill, exactfit, uniform, none fill Choose how your video is stretched in the video player
align alignleft, alignright, aligncenter alignleft The alignment of your video
plugins Add any code that is required to load plugins for the video player, for more information click here.
skin /lib/scripts/mediaplayer/fs39/fs39.xml The URL to your video player skin
player /lib/scripts/mediaplayer/player.swf The URL to your video player

function excerpt($limit) {
	$excerpt = explode(' ', get_the_excerpt(), $limit);
	if (count($excerpt)>=$limit) {
		array_pop($excerpt);
		$excerpt = implode(" ",$excerpt).'...';
	} else {
		$excerpt = implode(" ",$excerpt);
	}
	$excerpt = preg_replace('`[[^]]*]`','',$excerpt);
	return $excerpt;
}
[clear] 
<pre>function excerpt($limit) {
	$excerpt = explode(' ', get_the_excerpt(), $limit);
	if (count($excerpt)>=$limit) {
		array_pop($excerpt);
		$excerpt = implode(" ",$excerpt).'...';
	} else {
		$excerpt = implode(" ",$excerpt);
	}
	$excerpt = preg_replace('`[[^]]*]`','',$excerpt);
	return $excerpt;
}</pre>
